pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Each credit lets you colorize one photo in high resolution without watermarks.

onetime.name: One-time
onetime.description: Pay once for a pack of credits

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: One credit allows you to colorize one photo in high resolution without watermarks. You can use credits for any supported image size up to 5000x5000 pixels.
faq.answer2: For subscription plans, unused credits roll over up to five times your monthly allocation. Credits remain valid as long as your subscription is active. For one-time purchases, credits are valid for 2 years.
faq.question3: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer3: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your benefits will continue until the end of your billing period.
faq.question4: Is there a limit to how many photos I can colorize?
faq.answer4: The free plan allows unlimited colorizations with watermarks. For high-resolution, watermark-free images, you're limited by the number of credits in your plan.
